name: Standing Anal + Creampie LoRA
description:
A LoRA for creating standing anal sex images.

If you feel like supporting my work, please consider visiting my Patreon to get access to more detailed instructions on how to get the most out of my models and have a say in what's up next: Link.

Use 'standing anal' as the general trigger word. You might need to describe what you want to see a bit on top of that to help it along, something along the lines of 'getting fucked from behind by man'. Without that you (at least in my experience) get just a woman standing around quite often, without the guy.

Use 'creampie' to trigger the creampies, although they could look better admittedly.

That's about it, have fun!

Recommended LoRA strength 0.7-0.8.

Based on UberRealisticPornMerge

If you like this, you may also like my other LoRAs.
